typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		emp_id as short,
		Name as string,
		department as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['emp.csv']) ~> AllEmployee
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dept.csv']) ~> dept
Join1 split(equals(department,'1'),
	equals(department,'2'),
	equals(department,'3'),
	equals(department,'4'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(HREmployees, Payroll, Finance, IT, Admin)
AllEmployee, dept join(department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
ConditionalSplit1@HREmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['alter table hr_employee add deptname varchar;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		Name,
		department,
		country,
		deptname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> HRSQLtable
ConditionalSplit1@Payroll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		Name,
		department,
		country,
		deptname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PayrollSink
